item.title: Mutex Unlocked
item.description: // Mutex Locked #include <iostream>#include <vector>#include <mutex>#include <thread>std::mutex data; std::vector<int> myvec; void run(){ for(int i = 0; i < 10; i++){ data.lock(); myvec.push_back(i); data.unlock(); } } int main(){ std::thread t1(run); std::thread t2(run); t1.join(); t2.join(); return 0; }
